channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Te Rotorua-nui-a-Kahumatamomoe to uncover the story behind the original name of Mokoia island, ?Te Motu Tapu a Tinirau?. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: NEW: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Ra?kau, Pond Koka?, Pu and Waea Wao live.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: With the maero no longer a threat, Kura invites Ruiha to join them on the journey up the maunga to find the godstick and hopefully Rangi too. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamaiti T? Spring
channel.desc: NEW: Deep in the bush, the whanau clears tracks for hunters with karakia and teamwork. A delicious reward of milo and pihikete awaits.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mahi Tika Ana!
channel.desc: NEW: Tiaki taiao and kaitiakitanga are core values in te ao M?ori, making it essential to pass on this knowledge. Tune in as Hinewai and Hine Te Kura learn about composting from Arohanui West.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: NEW: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Explore the diverse life of Director of Photography Fred Renata. His work has enhanced our New Zealand Film industry through his exceptional visual storytelling and attention to lighting. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: A new voice in Autaia, Pukekohe High, shares its roots in working the land, highlighting wh?nau connections to kai cultivation, particularly potatoes, and what it means to be M?ori in Pukekohe. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: A grounded and locally-inspired piece, Pukekohe High presents a performance steeped in whenua, wh?nau, and working the land - honouring the generations who tilled the soil before them. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: Drew hits the road with the Six Nations MC, circles the car racing dirt track with ?The Mohawk Express?, and waxes up his surfboard with some Nova Scotia indigenous kids taking to the waves. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Uka
channel.desc: The best Euchre players from Tainui battle it out for the title of Uka champions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K?inga Whenua
channel.desc: Capturing the critical moments of building, developing and living on your tupuna whenua. Pio discovers a modern, innovative and stylish modular housing approach to kainga whenua development. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: First Weapons
channel.desc: Phil Breslin meets weapon makers and science experts, lifting the lid on the genius of Australia's oldest and most innovative weapons.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Kaaterama Pou as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Chey discusses the intricacies of Whaik?rero raps. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.title: T?ku Reo

channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: Takaro Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 years olds. Series 4 focuses on the environment and the Takaro Tribe become baby eco warriors, carrying magical backpacks. (R).

channel.title: P?kana 2025

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Siblings Eraia and Lahaina Kiel teach basic skills in poi, haka and other traditional M?ori performing arts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ariki 4
channel.desc: Ariki is a revolutionary M?ori martial arts series where teams of rangatahi battle it out. Based on the ancestral art form, ARIKI was created by Te Whare T? Taua o Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Wharekura
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Te Reo)
channel.desc: Ghosts. This is one of many topics that if it's not talked about, a lot of people will remain ignorant about the reason these spirits remain earthbound as ghosts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Vaa Voyagers Conquering The Hawaiki Nui
channel.desc: Team Pineula depart Aotearoa for Tahiti, but it's not long before the heat and illness strike. There are growing concerns amongst the camp that some may not make it to the start line. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hourangi Ng?ti W?hiao
channel.desc: Featuring T?hourangi Ng?ti W?hiao, Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. This is haka at its finest! (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Not Even
channel.desc: NEW: 3. Dumb Bitch Sharon On her birthday, Liz tries to repress her sadness over her late father. Over the course of the day, the group visits Liz, and they update her on their lives.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: R?rangi
channel.desc: After a sporting hero's death, transgender activist Caz Davis finds himself stranded back in his hometown of R?rangi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: End Of The Valley
channel.desc: Family, Right? Pressure from Kaea?s family begins to build while Ng?ti Kiokio mourns a loved one. (R).

channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: A serial drama thats all about drama. Following a group of city based rangatahi as they navigate life. (R).

channel.title: Out There

channel.title: Mauri Moana

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Howard Lovecraft and the Frozen Kingdom
channel.desc: PREMIERE: After opening the Necronomicon at his father's sanitarium, young Howard is transported into a frozen, otherworldly realm teeming with Lovecraftian horrors. There, he befriends a creature named Spot and must navigate perilous environments to find his way home.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Black Bear
channel.desc: Starring Aubrey Plaza. A filmmaker at a creative impasse seeks solace from her tumultuous past at a rural retreat, only to find that the woods summon her inner demons in intense and surprising ways. (R).
